src_original: sa bcu pa'i snga ltas ni/_bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa'i mdo las/ rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i/_byang chub sems dpa' sa dang po'i snga ltas ni/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten

bu de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'o/_/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa gnyis pa'i snga ltas ni/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams lag mthil lta bur gyur pa la/_rin po che bye ba
sa gsum pa'i snga ltas ni/_bdag nyid dpa' zhing lag cha dang go cha sra ba
thogs nas phas kyi rgol ba thams cad 'dul bar mthong ngo /_/
sa bzhi pa'i snga ltas ni/_phyogs bzhi ni rlung gi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang ldan pa'i sa'i dkyil 'khor chen po la/_me tog sna tshhogs kyis mngon par
mthong ste/_de la bdag nyid rtshe dga' zhing longs su spyod pa mthong ngo /_/ sa bdun pa'i snga ltas ni/_phyogs g.yas g.yon gnyis nas sems can
dmyal ba'i g.yang sa mthong ste/_de nas bdag nyid ma gnod ma nyams par slar ldog par mthong ngo /_/
sa brgyad pa'i snga ltas ni/_phrag pa gnyis na ri dwags kyi rgyal po seng ge
ral pa can cod pan thogs pa gcan zan phra mo thams cad skrag par byed cing
sa dgu pa'i snga ltas ni/_'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por mthong ste/
skye bo khrag khrig brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor zhing /_mdun gyis bltas la/ mgo bo'i steng na rin po che sna tshhogs kyis spras pa'i gdugs dkar po 'dzin
par mthong / sa bcu pa'i snga ltas ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mthong ste/_kha
dog gser lta bu/_'od 'dom gang ba/_tshhangs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya
